targets.queryText: SELECT CAST(json_extract(payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.return_attribution_1m.total_return_dollars') AS REAL) AS value FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1;

targets.queryText: WITH latest AS (SELECT payload_json FROM snapshot_daily_current ORDER BY as_of_date_local DESC LIMIT 1) SELECT json_extract(j.value,'$.symbol') AS symbol, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.contribution_dollars') AS REAL) AS contribution_dollars, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.contribution_pct') AS REAL) AS contribution_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.contribution_breakdown.income') AS REAL) AS income_pct, CAST(json_extract(j.value,'$.contribution_breakdown.price') AS REAL) AS price_pct FROM latest, json_each(latest.payload_json,'$.portfolio_rollups.return_attribution_1m.top_contributors') j ORDER BY contribution_dollars DESC;
